Detailed Description

seDRMInterfaceTemplate wraps the DRM <Interface_Template> class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMInterfaceTemplate::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference.
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_INTERFACE_TEMPLATE
